titleStmt.title: Exporting unmanufactured goods the only cause of the want of employ for our poor, the beating down of the price of wooll, the fall of estates, the diminishing of the King's revenues, the discouraging merchandising, and impoverishing of the nation in general.

notesStmt.note: C1:3 imperfect: missing text at foot.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
